title: tPA (Alteplase) Dosing for Ischemic Stroke Calculator
desc: The tPA (Tissue Plasminogen Activator) Dosing for Stroke Calculator doses tPA for stroke.

other_refer.text: Intracerebral hemorrhage after intravenous t-PA therapy for ischemic stroke. The NINDS t-PA Stroke Study Group. Stroke. 1997;28(11):2109-18.

data.evidence:
tPA dosing is calculated by the following:

Dose, mg = 0.9*(Weight, kg)

Administer 10% of the total dose as an initial IV bolus over 1 minute and the remainder infused over 60 minutes.

Waste, mg = 100 - (Bolus, mg + Infusion, mg)

Note: Total maximum dose is 90 mg.
